name: M.U.: Broken Tethers
description:
(The house is dark.

It wasn't always like this.)

Broken Tethers is a short game made for the 3rd O2A2 Visual Novel Jam, a jam about limiting yourself to one sprite, one background, and 1k words. It's set in the universe of an existing series of mine, Magic Unlocked, but playing that game is not required to understand this one. (The lack of context is intentional.)

CREDITS:

  • "Night Ambience" by cclaretc on Pixabay.
  • Sound effect by steinhyrninguron Pixabay.
